originator.translation[0].definitions[0]: the person who first has the idea for something and starts it
Professor Adams was the originator of the project.
originator.translation[1].definitions[0]: someone who has an original idea, starts an activity etc
Xerox was the originator of many innovations.
originator.translation[1].definitions[1]: a financial institution that makes a loan, rather than one that buys the loan, collects interest payments on it etc
Many banks have been large originators of business loans, but resell the loans to other lenders.
